title: Card Freeze OTP Requirement
contentText: All card freeze operations must include OTP verification unless classified as emergency security event with risk score >= 90.

title: Dispute Amount Authorization
contentText: Disputes over $5000 require lead agent approval. Disputes over $25000 require manager approval and additional documentation.

title: PII Data Redaction Requirements
contentText: All card numbers (13-19 digits), SSNs, and account numbers must be redacted in logs, traces, and UI displays. Use ****REDACTED**** format.

title: API Rate Limiting Policy
contentText: Enforce 5 requests per second per client with token bucket algorithm. Return 429 with Retry-After header when exceeded.

title: Audit Trail Requirements
contentText: All case actions must be logged with actor, timestamp, action type, and payload. Maintain 7 year retention for compliance.
